definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to write a flawless essay in one go (idiom)/to be quick-witted and skilled at writing compositions
see 不假思索[bu4 jia3 si1 suo3]
without giving due consideration/to ignore/to overlook

sentences.english: The possibility of a last-ditch resistance by the enemy should not be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 敵人負隅頑抗的可能性是不可不加考慮的。

sentences.english: Then they fire them without a second thought.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們會不加考慮，就把他解僱。

sentences.english: No teacher shall stamp on a child's idea without considering it.
sentences.chinese: 老師不應該不加考慮就把孩子的想法壓制下去。

sentences.english: Ep560 - Old Madam Hong tries to persuade Zhizhong stop his evil deeds, but Zhizhong ignores her.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太苦口婆心勸志忠勿再做壞事，但志忠不加理會。

sentences.english: In this scenario, a user retrieves data from the database with no locks.
sentences.chinese: 在此方案中，用戶從數據庫中檢索數據而不加任何鎖。

sentences.english: If there is not add regard for the five ray backlash destroy.
sentences.chinese: 如有不加顧念者五雷誅滅。

sentences.english: Because this it came to me in a moment , form my own head .
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是從我自己頭腦裏不加思索地出來了。

sentences.english: The moment I stop running to keep up with it, I'll be discarded without a second thought.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我停下追趕的腳步，我就會被不加考慮地丟棄。

sentences.english: Patients who responded to chemotherapy received radiotherapy with or without additional chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 對化療有反應的患者行放射治療加或不加輔助化療。

sentences.english: Acting before thinking always results in failure.
sentences.chinese: 做事之前不加考慮總會導致失敗。

sentences.english: Without thinking, Ray dove into the water.
sentences.chinese: 雷不加思索地就跳進了水裏。

sentences.english: We have perfumed and unscented soap.
sentences.chinese: 我們有香皂和不加香水的肥皂。

sentences.english: He waded into the discussion without thinking.
sentences.chinese: 他不加思索就熱情地投入了討論。

sentences.english: He won’t pay attention to anybody, you’re just wasting your breath.
sentences.chinese: 他對誰都不加理會，你不過是白費口舌。

sentences.english: Those who never blot a line in writing are rare.
sentences.chinese: 文不加點的人是很少有的。

sentences.english: You're right, my country deserve my unthinking and unquestioning support.
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，我的國家值得我不加思考與無條件地支持。

definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to work extra hours/to do overtime
need not/does not have to/not necessarily
